title: Forget “Google Zero.” We need to talk about “People Zero.”
description: Your carefully curated homepage is invisible. Your design choices don’t matter. Your branding gets reduced to a small icon or a parenthetical citation in a chatbot’s answer — if you’re lucky to be cited at all. Pageview-based ad revenue collapses, along with your affiliate clicks. Email subscriptions stagnate with no new people seeing your sign-up...
